events.name: eds-file-upload-cancel
events.description: fired on file upload cancel event. Resets the file upload and sets the selected file name to null.

events.name: eds-file-upload-change
events.description:
fired on file upload change event.
The `detail` object has the following format:
```
{
   name: string, // name of the file
   size: number, // size of the file in Bytes
   type: string, // MIME type
   file: File // the uploaded `File` object
}
```

properties.name: accept
properties.description: used to allow specific file type to upload

properties.name: buttonText
properties.description: Button text for the file upload component

properties.name: clearUploadedFile
properties.description: The uploaded file can be reset by setting this value to true. After reset, this value will be set back to false. Default value is false.

properties.name: hideRemoveIcon
properties.description: The reset button of the File upload component can be hidden by setting this to true. Default value is false.

properties.name: isDisabled
properties.description: File upload component can be disabled by setting this to true. Default value is false.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Placeholder text for the file upload component

EDSFileUpload.description: File upload is a form element of html. Function needs to be implemented on change event of file input element to get details of the file to be uploaded Function needs to be implemented on click event of the close icon. This function will reset file input element.
EDSFileUpload.name: File Upload
EDSFileUpload.usage:
```html
<eds-file-upload></eds-file-upload>
```
The following css variables are available for styling :

CSS Variable | Description
:----------------|:-------------
--eds-file-upload-placeholder-color | Color for placeholder text
--eds-file-upload-name-color | Color for filename text
--eds-file-upload-disabled-color | Color for disabled text
--eds-file-upload-reset-color | Color for reset icon
